roleset.name: lift, raise
roleset.note: HOIST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hoist' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from hoist.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: hoist by your own petard
example.text: [A huge ANC flag, with black, green and gold stripes,]-1 was hoisted [*-1]over the rickety gate at Mr. Sisulu's modest house, while on the street out front, boys displayed the ANC colors on their shirts, caps and scarves.
example.arg: over the rickety gate at Mr. Sisulu's modest house
while on the street out front, boys displayed the ANC colors on their shirts, caps and scarves
